QueryResult.text: select cmn_exchange_rates.id odf_pk, cmn_exchange_rates.ID as exchange_rate_key, cmn_exchange_rates.calculation_method as calc_method_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'FIN_CALC_METHOD_TYPE' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = cmn_exchange_rates.calculation_method) as calculation_method_caption, cmn_exchange_rates.from_currency_code as from_currency_code, cmn_exchange_rates.to_currency_code as to_currency_code, CMN_DATE_TRUNC_FCT(CMN_EXCHANGE_RATES.FROM_DATE) as from_date, CMN_DATE_TRUNC_FCT(CMN_EXCHANGE_RATES.TO_DATE) as to_date, cmn_exchange_rates.rate_type as rate_type_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'FIN_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = cmn_exchange_rates.rate_type) as rate_type_caption, cmn_exchange_rates.rate as rate, cmn_exchange_rates.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from cmn_exchange_rates cmn_exchange_rates inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
